summary: I am a Forest Engineer from Lima - Peru, resident of the Netherlands since 31 may 2018, currently in the process of civic integration (homologation of diplomas and studying the Dutch language); I have work experience in the environmental management and green areas department of local governments in Lima- Peru. I am analytic, proactive and have creative abilities, I prefer to work in a team, and am used to adapt to change. I am searching for new professional experiences in The Netherlands where I can use my experience from Peru, and my Education followed at the National Agrarian University – La Molina.

education.grade: Master of Science in Forest and Forestry Resources Management
Diploma of Specialization in Management, Design of Green Areas and Urban Arboric

projects.title: Back-Home-Action Plan: Course Citizen Participation and Governance Inclusive in The Hague Academy for Local Governance - Talent Program  "Adapting to climate change through afforestation in  “La Nueva Rinconada" in San Juan de Miraflores  Municipality
projects.description:
Title: Adapting to climate change through afforestation of 3 Human Settlements in “La Nueva Rinconada” with citizen participation - Improving quality life and promote a safe and smart city in San Juan de Miraflores  Municipality

The purpose of the project is to strengthen the environmental culture to the people about the need to work together for the protection of the environment to improve the quality of life for residents of  “La Nueva Rinconada”( 46.932 inhabitants).

The residents of that area will be benefit, starting the first pilot   to 3 human settlements:  El Paraíso”, La Flor de Amancaes  and  Defensores de la Familia”, (860 inhabitants).

That area covers the tops of the hills and is one of the poorest areas, as people do not have basic services like sanitation and electricity and is the most inaccessible area in that district. The inhabitant have settled their homes in the hillsides of high slope and is located on an area of unstable soils and high risk of loose material sliding along the trails where this could detach and affect homes lower; There also slope instability due to the lack of protection and the type of soil could fall by gravity.

The uptown of that area has an ecosystem of green hills, which is affected due to the rapid growth of land invasions, which have altered and reducing the quality of life of these people, directly impacting the natural ecosystem which decreases daily.

The Implementation´ s project will undertake for that Municipallity through a pilot program, which will initially consist of  afforestation with 2000 trees of native species in the areas currently limit the hills and Human Settlement , to prevent its expansion, which will lead to environmental benefits for the people and the ecosystem ; for execution is counted with a participation plan and sensitization of the people. Also, watering is done through the implementation of a system-catchers.

projects.title: Volumetry of standing trees of Swietenia macrophylla  (Mahogany , Caoba) - Madre de Dios, Peru
projects.description: This paper was worked with a sample of 120 individuals from the seed stand Tahuamanu and annual operational plans Maderija – Maderacre of the year 2006, provided by the UNALM ITTO project PD 251/03 Rev. 3 ( F) "Evaluation of commercial stocks and strategy for the sustainable management of mahogany ( Swietenia macrophylla ) in Peru" . The objective of this paper is to develop a system of equations to estimate the volume net of wood of the mahogany trees, located in Amazonian forests in Madre de Dios, using variables easily obtained in standing trees. To determine the volume equations were made regression analysis grounded in the Method of Least Squares for each of the models; the failed models were discarded, and the models suitable were weighted with different factors, building new models of equations that underwent weighted regression analysis; the resulting were compared by Furnival index. Finally, the equation more accurately estimating the volume was obtained, being this: V = 0.16073 to 0.01130 dh + d + 0.00039772 0.00022887 0.00006968 d2 + d 2hq5qpc.. On the other hand, the Form Factor per individual was calculated, concluding that form factors are higher than those recommended by the Ministry of Agriculture.
